name: cc-plugins
description: A collection of Claude Code plugins and utilities

plugins.name: claude-settings
plugins.description: Plugin for managing and merging Claude settings files across user, project, and local scopes with merge capabilities

plugins.name: secure-env
plugins.description: Security plugin that helps protect sensitive .env files from accidental access by Claude Code while still allowing access to .env.example files

plugins.name: notifications
plugins.description: Plugin for managing audio and popup notifications when Claude is waiting for input or completes tasks
